 Collection Strategies 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Email 
 (951) 827-3703 
 
 
 Collection Strategies plans, implements, and assesses the ways and means by which the University of California, Riverside Library’s collections grow and improve, to meet the research and curricular needs of a dynamic community of scholars and researchers.
